в 2015 году, купил, скачал, зашел на пару часиков, остался. Кс хуйня кста
En vrai , si vous cherchez de la compétition , vous allez être servi ^^

CS:GO is the single best competitive shooter ever made. Compare it to Rainbow, Overwatch and Paladins and you will get the same result.

This is the definitive eSports shooter and one of the best games ever made in my opinion, it never dies, the constant updates keep the game looking modern and running well, despite being almost 8 years old.

If you take games seriously and love to be competitive, this is the game for you. This is no run and gun, spray and pray shooter, this is a tactical masterpiece, if you don't make the right decision, you're a dead man. If you get everything right, you could still be a dead man.

I wont lie though, some maps are unbalanced, but this almost adds to the fun in a strange way, switching sides at the halfway mark can see you go from top dog to the dog house and visa versa.

But wait, there's more! 

This masterpiece of a game, this absolute Picasso project is now completely FREE TO PLAY.

Download it.
